sci:publications.citation: Arguez, A., I. Durre, S. Applequist, R. Vose, M. Squires, X. Yin, R. Heim, and T. Owen, 2012: NOAA's 1981-2010 climate normals: An overview. Bull. Amer. Meteor. Soc., 93, 1687-1697. DOI: 10.1175/BAMS-D-11-00197.1.
